name: scat to unif
desc: The scat_to_unif module is used to convert scattered sample data into a three-dimensional uniform field.

properties.name: I Dimension
properties.desc: The I Dimension is the resolution of the grid in the X direction.

properties.name: J Dimension
properties.desc: The J Dimension is the resolution of the grid in the Y direction.

properties.name: K Dimension
properties.desc: The K Dimension is the resolution of the grid in the Z direction.

properties.name: Search Distance X
properties.desc: Distance along X axis to search for input data points.

properties.name: Search Distance Y
properties.desc: Distance along Y axis to search for input data points.

properties.name: Search Distance Z
properties.desc: Distance along Z axis to search for input data points.

properties.name: Data For Interpolation
properties.desc: The Data For Interpolation allows the user to select the nodal data from the input field to interpolate to the created TIN.

properties.name: Interpolation Order
properties.desc: The Interpolation Order controls the order of interpolation done on the adjacent nodes.
